content.html: We all agree the status quo is unsustainable. Here are 1,000 words on how we could get the role of Open Source maintainer to graduate to a real, properly paid profession. The thing is, companies need it as much as maintainers do. blog.filippo.io/professional-mâ€¦
content.value:
We all agree the status quo is unsustainable.

Here are 1,000 words on how we could get the role of Open Source maintainer to graduate to a real, properly paid profession.

The thing is, companies need it as much as maintainers do.
